# UITableViewCell.SelectionStyle.gray

**Case**

The cell has a gray background when it’s selected.

## Declaration

```swift
case gray
```

## Discussion

Use [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITableViewCell/SelectionStyle-swift.enum/default] instead.

## Constants

- **UITableViewCell.SelectionStyle.none**: The cell has no distinct style for when it’s selected.
- **UITableViewCell.SelectionStyle.blue**: The cell has a default background color when it’s selected.
- **UITableViewCell.SelectionStyle.default**: The cell selection style to use for tables.
